measured_by: Understanding America Study single-item 0-100% rating (“If you do get the coronavirus, what is the percent chance you will die from it?”)
justification: The Methods section states that participants "rated their subjectively perceived risk of dying from COVID-19, on a scale from 0 to 100, with the following wording: 'If you do get the coronavirus, what is the percent chance you will die from it?'"
